com.bit6.sdk.websocket

Class NoCopyByteArrayOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
        • com.bit6.sdk.websocket.NoCopyByteArrayOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class NoCopyByteArrayOutputStream
extends java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
    OutputStream backed by a byte array. This class provides copyless access to byte array backing the ByteArrayOutputStream

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NoCopyByteArrayOutputStream()
      Create new OutputStream backed by byte array.
      NoCopyByteArrayOutputStream(int size)
      Create new OutputStream backed by byte array.

      Get byte array underlying this OutputStream.

      Wraps the underyling byte array into an InputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
        Wraps the underyling byte array into an InputStream.
        Returns:
        New InputStream wrapping byte buffer underlying this stream.

      • getByteArray

        public byte[] getByteArray()
        Get byte array underlying this OutputStream. This does not copy any data, but return reference to the underlying byte array.
        Returns:
        Underlying byte array by reference.
